backgroundImage - Variable in class prog04.EarShooterMainClass
This is background image
BAIL_OUT_IF_ASPECT_RATIOS_DONT_MATCH - Static variable in interface prog04.ApplicationConstants
Set this constant to true if you want to ensure that you don't end up with different aspect ratios for world and window (which could could result in either clipping at top and bottom of the window (if WORLD_HEIGHT < PIXEL_TO_WORLD*WINDOW_WIDTH) or non-painted bands at the top and bottom of the window (if WORLD_HEIGHT < PIXEL_TO_WORLD*WINDOW_WIDTH)
BOTTOM_WINDOW_Y - Static variable in class prog04.Spaceship
 
BoundingBox - Class in prog04
creates the bounding box of an object
BoundingBox(float, float, float, float, int) - Constructor for class prog04.BoundingBox
Creates a new bounding box at set dimensions and color.
BoundingBox(int) - Constructor for class prog04.BoundingBox
Creates an empty bounding box with the specified contour color
BoundingBox() - Constructor for class prog04.BoundingBox
Creates an empty black box
BoundingBoxMode - Enum in prog04
A simple enum class for various rendering modes (really unused in this demo)
BoundingBoxMode() - Constructor for enum prog04.BoundingBoxMode
